TextBlock.Text: Anse: It appears this icy rogue planet was captured by that dim neutron star.
Lachoncha: This is so sad, the tiny star's output is too little to reach this world.
Nissi: Every planet should have a sun, we should do something.
Navagio: Of course, we can't leave a planet sunless or else we don't deserve to call ourselves the 12th clan.
